# Point Blank Master (Feat)
## Overview
You are adept at firing ranged weapons in close quarters.

**Prerequisite:** [[Weapon Specialization (Feat)|Weapon Specialization]] with selected ranged weapon.

**Benefit:** Choose one type of ranged weapon. You do not provoke attacks of opportunity when firing the selected weapon while threatened.

**Normal:** Using a ranged weapon while you are threatened provokes attacks of opportunity.

**Special:** Starting at 6th level, a ranger with the archery combat style may select Point Blank Master as a combat style feat, but he must have [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] instead of [[Weapon Specialization (Feat)|Weapon Specialization]] in the selected weapon.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 167
